description:
Create a persistent notification area showing progress of long-running operations like bulk imports, report generation, or SMS campaigns. Allow users to navigate away and return to check status without blocking their workflow.

**Rationale:** Bulk operations can take minutes to complete. A progress tracker lets users multitask while monitoring job status, preventing them from abandoning operations or wondering if something failed.
title: Background Job Progress Tracker
